No ranking system based on skill, Devs are not shy about their Survivor bias and it shows in the balance. Match making is garbage, again likely due to no real ranking system, crappy map designs that favor one side or the other.  

Killer is frustrating and a chore to play and survivor is mindless and boring. I've not touched the game since Jan 2020 but prior to that I had just stopped playing killer at all because of how unfun it has become. Only playing survivor and how easy it was got boring fast after a few months.  

if you have a group SWF or Kill your friends might be fun, if you just want a casual game and don't care about stuff like balance and challenging game play then might be up your alley but if you're looking for well balanced, fun and competitve Multiplayer game.. don't waste your money.

游戏是好游戏，但匹配机制不平衡，相当于你LOL白银段位时有一半时间都可能会碰到钻石段位的玩家。现版本屠夫比较弱势。碰见bug和错误不要惊慌，游戏特色。另外推荐新手玩屠夫的话，开加速器去美服，匹配的快一些，被抓壮丁概率也小一点。

Positives: 
-Tons of replayability
-Addictive
-Fun to play with friends
-Lots of different customisation with perk builds etc

Negatives:
-Extremely toxic community (One of the worst I've seen, however can be pretty hilarious)
-The grind is huge to unlock all perks etc, expect to put in 1-2k hours to unlock everything
-Can become unfun as you progress in the ranks as players play more toxic/sweaty

Overall I recommend this game despite the community it's a very fun game most of the time and you can expect to be putting in many hours into this game.

La verdad pésimamente optimizado el juego, los fps a veces se disparan hacia abajo porque sí, desconexiones todo mínimo 1 de cada 2 partidas y te penalizan para buscar partidas por los fallos de ellos, ya lleva mucho tiempo el juego en venta como para permitir esta clase de errores, así que lamentablemente no puedo recomendarlo.

El juego es divertido, básicamente es un equipo de 4 supervivientes contra 1 asesino, desde el inicio puedes elegir qué serás.

Los supervivientes tienen que reparar los generadores y escapar, mientras el asesino los busca y los cuelga.

Las cosas que no me gustaron del juego:
-Tarda mucho en encontrar partidas y no te pone contra gente de tu mismo nivel
-Está limitado a 60fps y las configuraciones en el menú son muy básicas.

A mi me gusta mucho este juego debido a que no es repetitivo, cada asesino juega diferente, cada superviviente tiene su estrategia, es un reto escapar del asesino, y el logro de poder sobrevivir al final es siempre emocionante, he recomendado este juego a un amigo mio y no le gusta, cree que es siempre lo mismo: reparar, escapar del asesino y ya. Son diferentes puntos de vista, pero yo lo veo muy emociante, lo sigo recomendado, proximamente se lo comprare a mi hermano :)

Dead by Daylight can be fun but it can also be toxic. Before you decide to purchase it, i do recommend to watch some youtube videos as it actually shows how the game play can be. I personally love the game. I try to play it everyday. I played on the PS4 platform for a few years and fell in love with it and upgraded to PC and I love it more if that's possible. But again this is my opinion on the game. Some games your teammates will be trash so i do recommend trying to play with friends but solo play is possible none the less. If you get it, enjoy.

only when the devs you know, make the [b]killer ability : survivor abilities[/b] equal lmfao. This recent update literally means this:
.swf (3/4 man) [b]almost always[/b] guarantee an escape if you're competent
.nurse is still f*cking broken and overly toxic to play against as always
.this game is literally reliant on luck a lot of the time
.you either finish the game all dead with 1 or 2 gens done or you all escape
.I'm convinced this mmr system isnt real
.your rank does not matter, nobody cares if you're an iridescent survivor/killer pls
.and this game is less soothing than asphyxiation
.dont google asphyxiation unless you want suicide hotline numbers
.the new killer is the best thing to happen to this game since release
